article.caption: Tulisa is dragged into sex vid storm
X Factor Tulisa is so Skin love
Tulisa and Dappy Twitter war over N-Dubz split
Tulisa Contostavlos beds TOWIE hunk Mark Wright
Tulisa shows who's boss

articles.articlebody:
X FACTOR judge Tulisa Contostavlos last night apologised to fans as she admitted it was her in a sex tape touted online.

The N-Dubz singer, 23, claimed the tape showed an "intimate moment" with ex Justin Edwards.

And she said that the DJ  called MC Ultra  had "betrayed" her by posting the X-rated video online.

She said: "I am devastated, heartbroken.

"When you share an intimate moment with someone that you love and trust you never imagine for one minute that footage may at any point be shared with the rest of the UK."

The film, from a high-quality camera phone, shows Tulisa performing a sex act for over six minutes.

An internet firm charged viewers £3.90 to download it on Monday but the site was suspended several hours later.

Tulisa posted a video apology on YouTube called The Truth About The Tape, linked from her Twitter account. In it she twice held up photos of her and Justin  who she went out with for several years from the age of 17.

One showed them on holiday together on the island of Kos in Greece.

She claimed: "This is the person, Justin Edwards aka Ultra, who is my ex-boyfriend, that has put it online, who is the other person on the tape."

Justin used his Twitter account @officialultra to deny her claims. He tweeted: "It's nothing to do with me. #backtowork."

He was unavailable for comment last night.

m.wilkinson@the-sun.co.uk
articles.teaser: X FACTOR judge Tulisa Contostavlos has apologised to fans  after admitting it was her in a sex tape touted online
articles.headline: Tulisa: It IS me in that sex film
articles.subdeck: Confession ... Tulisa talks in online clip last night

image.caption: Bum note ... David Walliams on the Jonathan Ross Show

article.caption: BGT first look shows no signs of boybands
One's Duch a fan of Britain's Got Talent
David Walliams gives Simon Cowell the willies
Simon Cowell style shocker
Simon Cowell: 'BGT is so cool'

articles.articlebody:
DAVID Walliams has revealed he is constantly asked one question  whether Simon Cowell is gay.

The new Britain's Got Talent judge said family, celeb mates and fans forever quiz him over his new boss's sexuality.

In an appearance with Simon on this weekend's Jonathan Ross Show, the comic said he finds it intriguing that most people seem obsessed by The X Factor supremo's preferences.

He said: "I have never done anything where people are more interested. The main question I get is, 'Is Simon gay?'

"Even my mum was going, 'Yeah he is really nice  is he gay?'"

Teasing Simon, David added: "Well we know the answer to that. With the gay thing, the jury is still out."

In the scenes to be aired on Saturday, the Little Britain funnyman cavorted on the sofa. He even wound up media mogul by touching his leg with his hand.

He also tweeted a picture of himself with Simon as they sat in the green room, with the caption: "Me and my boyfriend".

David told how Simon often blamed HIM for auditions starting late  claiming that he was "busy" gobbling gourmet food.

He said: "We don't tend to start auditions until 4pm. Simon is a bit late and then he goes in front of the audience and says, 'The reason we are starting late today is because David is eating a three-course meal.'

"The audience are booing me because that's his idea of a joke."

Meanwhile, Simon dashed fans' hopes that he will return to The X Factor by insisting he only came back to BGT after a fans' petition.

Due to his commitments to the US version, he said it would be too difficult to join the panel.

He said: "It's impossible. I would like to but at the moment they run at exactly the same time. But I do miss not doing it."

When host Jonathan said his absence was noticed in last year's BGT, Simon quipped: "There was a petition and six million people signed it to get me back."

The pop guru also confessed to proposing to scores of girls. After admitting they had ALL refused, Simon assured the audience he was happy to be single.

  • Hollywood's Danny DeVito, comic Dara O'Briain and singer Labrinth also make an appearance on the ITV1 show on Saturday at 10.20pm.
articles.teaser: EXCLUSIVE: BRITAIN'S Got Talent judge says he is always asked if boss Simon is gay
articles.headline: David Walliams: Fans always ask me if Simon likes men or laydees
articles.subdeck: Bum note ... David Walliams on the Jonathan Ross Show

image.caption: Who's that girl ... Jenna-Louise Coleman

article.caption: Jenna-Louise Coleman is the new pal for Dr Who
Karen Gillan's the Dr Ooh girl
Who's snogging Karen Gillan?
Dr Who and pals get exterminated
Matt Smith is Time Lord of the Fries

articles.articlebody:
NEW Doctor Who sidekick Jenna-Louise Coleman has revealed that she has been a nervous wreck trying to keep her new job under wraps.

The former Emmerdale actress was forbidden from talking about sci-fi's biggest secret until her role was officially announced yesterday.

She admitted: "I am so relieved it is out. My flatmates had no idea and it has kind of opened this whole web of lies.

"I have realised that I am actually quite a good liar, which is terrifying actually. I'm beyond excited  I want to get started already."

Speculation about who would take over as the Time Lord's assistant has been rife since Karen Gillan  who has played Amy Pond for the past two series  announced her departure in December.

She will leave in the fifth episode of the series, which is due to screen on BBC1 in the autumn.

But fans will have to wait until the show's Christmas special for the introduction of the new character.

The 25 year old  who played Emmerdale lesbian Jasmine Thomas until 2009  won the role after wowing bosses with her screen test and her chemistry with Time Lord Matt Smith.

But show boss Steven Moffat has so far refused to reveal the name of the character that she will play. He said: "Who she's playing, how the Doctor meets her and even where he finds her are all part of one of the biggest mysteries the Time Lord has ever encountered. Even by the Doctor's standards, this isn't your usual boy meet girl."

Of Amy Pond's exit, he said: "It will be a final encounter with the angels and not everybody gets out alive  and I really mean it this time."

Jenna-Louise  a long-time fan of the show  admitted that former Time Lord David Tennant and his sidekick Billie Piper were her favourite pairing.

But she described her new co-star Matt Smith as "amazing" and "very supportive".

And Moffat said Jenna-Louise  who also stars in ITV1's Titanic series which starts on Sunday  was the only person he has met who can keep up with Matt's pace.

He also revealed: "There was a moment I remember when they were auditioning together and they both looked frightened doing a Doctor Who scene.

"It was an instant poster and I thought, 'God that's brilliant'."

Jenna-Louise found out that she had landed the job while in a Marks & Spencer store buying food.

She said: "I was debating what goes best in a salmon salad and I got a call from my agent.

"I thought, 'I can't carry on shopping now.' So I put down my basket and left.

"I couldn't tell anyone so I went for a bit of a walk and tried to digest it. It's all been quite surreal."

Moffat also confirmed that as well as this year's six episodes, a further eight will be broadcast next year to mark the show's 50th anniversary.

The first episode aired in November 1963 with William Hartnell in the title role.



Who gets two kids



DAVID Tennant claims he is a "double dad", after adopting his wife's ten-year-old son.

The former Doctor Who actor said he made the decision to adopt his actress wife Georgia Moffett's son Tyler last year, shortly after the birth of the couple's daughter, Olive.

He said: "My baby is almost a year old and I adopted my wife's boy last year as well, so I became a father twice in six months. That's got to be something of a record, hasn't it?"

David met Georgia when she guest-starred in an episode of Doctor Who in 2008, playing his daughter.

And after falling in love, the pair married on New Year's Eve in 2011.

Their daughter Olive was born in March last year and it was shortly afterwards that David officially adopted Tyler and they all became one big happy family.

Georgia  the daughter of former Time Lord Peter Davison and American actress Sandra Dickinson  gave birth to Tyler in 2002, aged just 17.

She brought him up alone and has never publicly revealed the identity of her son's father.
articles.teaser: EMMERDALE'S Jenna-Louise Coleman says that she was a nervous wreck trying to keep her new job under wraps
articles.headline: Jenna-Louise's sci-fi of relief
articles.subdeck: Who's that girl ... Jenna-Louise Coleman

image.caption: You gotta hand it to him ... Leandro gets to grips with Katie's leg

article.caption: Underwear shots prove It's All About Amy
Katie Price: I'll keep kids off telly

articles.articlebody:
LEANDRO Penna gets touchy-feely with newly-divorced Katie Price as they watch a polo match.

There was plenty of horseplay between the pair as they took in the action at the HPA Gaucho International Polo event.

Leandro, 26, couldn't keep his hands off the former glamour model, touching her leg and putting his arm around her neck.

And he landed a smacker on her cheek and shy smiled in response.

But Katie, 33, seemed more interested in the horsemanship on the pitch, taking pictures as Leandro larked around.

Both wore matching white outfits for the event at London's O2, and the Argentinian must have felt right at home  it was sponsored by the steakhouse chain from his home country.

The Latin lover had plenty to celebrate, as Katie's divorce from Alex Reid was granted just 48 hours before.

She split from the cage-fighter in January 2011, less than a year after they wed in Vegas.

And she met male model Leandro at Elton John's Oscar party a month later.

The polo tournament was a perfect night out for Katie, who loves nothing more than horses and a bit of Argentinian beef.

She quite likes a steak too.
articles.teaser: LEANDRO Penna can't keep hands off newly-divorced Katie Price as they enjoy a night out at annual polo event
articles.headline: Leandro scores with Katie at polo match
articles.subdeck: You gotta hand it to him ... Leandro gets to grips with Katie's leg

image.caption: Fishing for compliments ... Donna Air

article.caption: Jameela is to face the music
It's Jam and toast Radio 1 shake-up
Single Jameela Jamil Plays cupid
Straight role for Jameela Jamil

articles.articlebody:
DONNA Air nets herself a fashion faux-pas  sporting a fishnet bodystocking over skinny jeans and a bra on a night out

The TV star was at the launch of Emilio Cavallini's new range of tights  for MEN.

Last week Francesco Cavallini, the vice-president of the Florence-based company, explained that men in Europe wear tights, "for warmth under pants during cold weather months and also at home to lounge around in".

And Lisa Cavallini, Francesco's sister added: "The unisex tights are mainly black-and-white, but I believe the men buying these tights want to make a fashion statement."

New Radio1 DJ Jameela Jamil also attended the event in statement stockings, a sheer shirt and a yellow blazer.

Jameela, who will host the Requests Show on Radio 1 from April 8, has said of her new gig: "Radio is the one place where no one can say it has anything to do with looks.

"I don't think my appearance will have anything to do with the criticism I'll get. It will be based on my skill and whether or not I have any."

And the presenter, who has no radio experience, added: "I know I am opening myself up for a lot of criticism but I will have to just suck it up and learn on the job. I hope people give me a chance."

Other guests at the fashion bash included I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here Now! host Laura Whitmore, who showed off her pins in red tights with polka dots splashed all over them.

And quirky singer Paloma Faith also posed for snaps, wearing a shirt, long pencil skirt and white hat, and rocked a pair of flower-print stockings.
articles.teaser: BLONDE star and Jameela Jamil go for different fishnet looks at launch of tights for... men
articles.headline: Donna Air-s her lingerie
articles.subdeck: Fishing for compliments ... Donna Air

image.caption: Cheeky chukker ... Denise Van Outen having fun at the polo

articles.articlebody:
DENISE Van Outen looked a fine filly as she went to watch the polo in London.

The actress attended the HPA Gaucho International Polo Event at the O2 with TOWIE star Lydia Bright.

The girls are good friends and recently completed a charity cycle in India together to raise money for Great Ormond Street Children's Hospital.

But it seemed the girls weren't too interested in the on-field activities, as they spent most of the day horsing around together.

At one point mum-of-one Denise was seen tucking into a huge mouthful of her lunch.

And later on she, Lydia and another blonde pal looked more than a little distracted as they giggled over messages on their friend's phone.
articles.teaser: TV stars Denise Van Outen and TOWIE's Lydia Bright don't seem too interested in the game
articles.headline: Denise and Lydia can't resist horsing around at the polo
articles.subdeck: Cheeky chukker ... Denise Van Outen having fun at the polo

image.caption: Soap stars and off-screen pals ... Barbara Windsor and June Brown

article.caption: Corrie Anne: I'm most hated in Britain
Champ Rowland Rivron: Moaners kill TV

articles.articlebody:
THEY haven't been on screen together since Peggy Mitchell left Walford back in September 2010.

But last night EastEnders veterans June Brown, 85, (Dot Cotton) and Barbara Windsor, 74, (Peggy) were reunited for a night on the town.

The two legendary actresses enjoyed a night out in Leicester Square, central London, to see singer Rose-Marie.

Then the perky pair headed for the after-show party at a nearby hotel.

Wearing brightly-coloured clothes and away from her usual dowdy Dot get up, June grinned for the cameras, while Barbara sported her famous blonde beehive and carried flowers given to her by a fan.

And with beaming smiles on their faces, they looked almost unrecognisable away from the usual Walford woes.
articles.teaser: LEGENDARY soap actresses June Brown and Barbara Windsor hit the town together
articles.headline: EastEnders Dot and Peggy enjoy a night up west
articles.subdeck: Soap stars and off-screen pals ... Barbara Windsor and June Brown

image.caption: In the fast lane ... Bernie Ecclestone and Simon Cowell enjoy night out at swanky restaurant

articles.articlebody:
THIS is probably the only dinner table where Simon Cowell is pushed out of pole position.

The multi-millionaire, 52, had to bow down to 5ft 4in billionaire Bernie Ecclestone at swanky Mayfair venue the C restaurant, and not just in the money stakes.

Simon, who at 5ft 9in has been mocked for wearing cuban heels to boost his own stature, towered over his wealthy pal as they left the posh Italian eatery.

But that didn't bother Bernie, 81, or Simon, who were all smiles.

Probably because there was no need to fight over who footed the bill.
articles.teaser: SIMON Cowell enjoys night out with billionaire pal F1 boss Bernie Ecclestone
articles.headline: They're not short of a bob or two
articles.subdeck: In the fast lane ... Bernie Ecclestone and Simon Cowell enjoy night out at swanky restaurant

image.caption: Love this suit ... actress Jennifer in a body stocking resembling one worn by singer J.Lo

article.caption: You've got to Love Hewitt
Corrie's Helen Flanagan has Rosie cheeks
Jennifer Love Phew-it
Bed 'n bawd
Jen 'vagazzles' her lady bits

articles.articlebody:
JENNIFER Love Hewitt was a dead ringer for namesake J.Lo in this bejewelled bodysuit.

The actress, 33, donned the body stocking  which looked almost identical to one worn by Jennifer Lopez at last year's AMA awards  to promote her TV film The Client List.

She plays a mum of three who turns to prostitution after her husband becomes unable to work and they face losing their home.

Her character Sam takes on a job in a massage parlour but soon realises that her clients expect more than a rubdown, and her life increasingly spirals out of control.

The promo for the US programme is not the first time Jennifer donned a bit of sparkle though.

She has previously revealed that she liked decorating her lady bits with crystals to make herself feel better.

She told US chat show Lopez Tonight: "After a break-up, a friend of mine Swarovski-crystalled my 'precious lady'. I was feeling awful, I'd been through a horrible break-up.

"I was like, 'Ah, this is awful and I need something to make me feel better.' It was the one thing I'd never tried before after a break-up, so I gave it a try. It's great. It's cute, it's cute. It really helped me. It looks like a little disco ball down there it's great. Really."

Jen even admitted she loves the treatment so much she makes sure to be vajazzled at all times.

She admitted: "I am currently 'vajazzled'. And it's hot pink for today, so that's good."

Jen, who is dating Jamie Kennedy, added: "I've had no complaints about it."
articles.teaser: ACTRESS pours her curves into a sexy body stocking with diamantes all over it
articles.headline: It's J.Lo(ve) Hewitt as actress copies singer's body stocking look
articles.subdeck: Love this suit ... actress Jennifer in a body stocking resembling one worn by singer J.Lo

image.caption: Humble ... fired Apprentice candidate Bilyana Apostolova

article.caption: Tough London lesson for struggling Apprentices
Our benefits culture is a joke..parents should send their kids out to work at 13  says Lord Sugar
Apprentice wannabe gets a lot of Hype
The Apprentice unveiled

articles.articlebody:
LORD Sugar has been blasted for "humiliating" fired wannabe Bilyana Apostolova.

In the opener of BBC1's new series of The Apprentice last night, viewers heard of Bilyana's humble upbringing in Bulgaria before coming to the UK aged 17 to forge a successful career in the City as a risk analyst.

But she was hauled into the boardroom for a poor showing in her task. When she tried to defend herself by outlining her achievements, she was slapped down by Lord Sugar.

He branded her tale a "sob story". Bilyana said later: "He humiliated me with his response.

"He said, 'Let's not get the violin out.' I thought that was quite ironic.

"Always, he says, 'I'm an East End boy from the back of the truck to one of the top guys... I was trying to bond with him.

"I shouldn't have gone. I've seen him credit people for sticking up for themselves which was the effect I was after  not the opposite and getting fired.

"You're under the spotlight and you don't get time to pick your words carefully and things come out as a bit of a rant."



Review



HD isn't the best look for big Al but series eight of The Apprentice kicked off in fine style.

The "buy stuff, print pictures on it, sell it" task led to decent bickering between the sorry 16 but the "best" lines were Sugar's: "I'm looking for the Marks to my Spencer, the Lennon to my McCartney".

Someone tell the scriptwriter: "You're fired."
articles.teaser: LORD Sugar has been blasted for mocking Bilyana Apostolova over upbringing while he fired her from show
articles.headline: Apprentice reject: Lord Sugar's jibe was so poor
articles.subdeck: Humble ... fired Apprentice candidate Bilyana Apostolova

image.caption: Suits you ... Mark Wright hits the town with Ryan Thomas

article.caption: Roch 'n' roll birthday
Tulisa's met her match in Jack O'Connell
Mark Wright suns himself on luxury yacht

articles.articlebody:
MARK Wright lands exactly the wrong accessory for his slick dark suit  a handbag in pink.

Corrie actor Ryan Thomas gave him the bag as they left Rochelle Wiseman's birthday bash at Aura in London's Mayfair on Tuesday night. The Saturdays star turned 23.

The bag belonged to Ryan's cobbles co-star Brooke Vincent  who soon got it back.

article.caption: Christine Bleakley's bummed out

articles.articlebody:
OUTNUMBERED'S Brockman family are back causing chaos  this time with Dancing On Ice host Christine Bleakley and fiancé Frank Lampard.

The kids, including Karen (Ramona Marquez), test the Chelsea ace's patience in a hilarious sketch for Sport Relief.

Frank said: "I'm hoping people enjoy it. If not they can laugh at my acting skills!"

Christine added: "I was giggling the whole way through."

It will be seen during Sport Relief from 7pm tomorrow on BBC1.

image.caption: New role ... Eddie Izzard will star in Mockingbird Lane

articles.articlebody:
EDDIE Izzard has landed a monster new role  as womanising vampire Grandpa Munster!

The British comedianturned-actor will star in new US comedy drama Mockingbird Lane, which is a revamped and updated version of classic 1960s family-friendly comedy The Munsters.

Eddie, 50, will play the role made famous by Al Lewis.

Head of the freaky family, Grandpa Munster  aka Sam Dracula  was a 300-year-old lady-loving vampire, who could change himself into other creatures including a bat and a wolf.

He was dad to Lily Munster and father-in-law to Herman, who lived together with their monster son Eddie and Lily's sister Marilyn at 1313 Mockingbird Lane.

Eddie  who also starred in US drama The Riches and films including Oceans 12 and 13  is believed to have signed up to play the role and also to produce the new series for NBC.

Mockingbird Lane is being written by Bryan Fuller (who created Pushing Daisies) and directed by Bryan Singer of X-Men fame.
articles.teaser: COMEDIAN Izzard will play Grandpa Munster in revamp of the freaky family comedy show
articles.headline: Eddie sinks his teeth into comedy vampire role
articles.subdeck: New role ... Eddie Izzard will star in Mockingbird Lane

Jen's ice dance finale to go with a bang
Katarina Witt not joining golden oldies
Dancing On Ice stars go head to headbanger
I'll get gold to make Torvill & Dean proud

articles.articlebody:
MATTHEW Wolfenden hopes to rain supreme in this weekend's Dancing On Ice final.

The Emmerdale star will be skating to Singing In The Rain for his showcase routine.

Meanwhile, Jorgie Porter, below, has made sure she's putting her best foot forward and is skating to her favourite Fallin' by Alicia Keys.

And she will perform her final showcase to Fame, which she has styled herself.

Jorgie, Matthew and Chico are still in the competition  all the stars are rehearsing for THREE dances each.

The top two stars will perform the Bolero  after Torvill and Dean open the show with the number.

article.caption: Prodijig twig big chance for gigs
Kimberly Wyatt: I have a girl crush on Davina

articles.articlebody:
GOT To Dance judge Kimberly Wyatt looks a far cry from her usual self in this plane Twitter pic.

The beauty posted the photo online on Monday with the message: "Private room security pat down. Bags searched as I'm boarding the plane. Dubai better be amazing!!!"

The star, 30, had banished her usual heavy make-up for a fresh-faced look as she took off on her holidays.

And earlier today the excited singer told fans: "Getting ready to be a tourist!! :)"

Last month, Kimberly confessed she fancies the pants off TV presenter Davina McCall.

The ex-Pussycat Doll  who has been dating US actor Kevin Schmidt since early 2009  admitted she developed the girl crush while the pair filmed Got To Dance together.

Kimberly said: "I think Davina is one of the most amazing, most incredible women I have ever met in my entire life.

"I am quite star-struck by her. Honestly, I have developed a girl crush."
articles.teaser: FORMER Pussycat Doll Kimberly Wyatt looks plane in new snap on aircraft

HOLLY Willoughby is stepping into Cilla Black's shoes to front a new series of Surprise Surprise!, 11 years after it was last on our screens.

Bosses are looking for kind-hearted people to nominate a friend, family member or colleague to appear on the show.

You can suggest a loved one for a special treat  whether a reunion, a reward or a proposal  by emailing surprisesurprise@itv.com.

CID called in to check Corrie plot

articles.articlebody:
JODIE Prenger must have a thick skin.

The West End star and Kym Marsh are both to play Elsie Tanner in a new Corrie musical. Despite being three years younger than Kym, Jodie will be the character in her older years.

Kym, 35  Michelle Connor in the ITV1 soap  will play the Street legend for the opening Sixties parts of Street Of Dreams. But Jodie, 32, will play Elsie in scenes set in the Eighties.

Jodie, who won 2008's BBC1 talent show I'd Do Anything, said: "Excited is not the word. Elsie is just a brilliant character."

Street Of Dreams will premiere in Manchester on May 9 and then tour the country.

article.caption: 'Cameron's film was a love story, my Titanic tells whole tragedy'
First look at iceberg disaster series Titanic

articles.articlebody:
A NEW drama will delve below decks tonight to try to uncover how the supposedly unsinkable Titanic met her icy end.

Inside The Titanic is based on witness statements given by some of the 710 survivors called to inquiries in London and New York in the days after the tragedy, which occurred almost 100 years ago.

The big-budget, 90-minute documentary depicts how the ship sank, from the perspective of the men in the engine rooms who struggled to save it.

It is intercut with a series of tales from the passengers, such as a man who raced to save his secret mistress, a nurse hunting for a child in her care and two brothers debating whether to jump from the stricken liner or stay aboard.

The programme uses CGI based on the blueprints of the doomed ship and forensic analysis, coupled with actors delivering the words of the eyewitnesses.

Inside The Titanic is on Channel 5 at 8pm tonight.
articles.teaser: A BIG-budget documentary will delve below decks to try to uncover how the Titanic sank  using witness statements
articles.headline: How the Titanic met her end

image.caption: Porn problem ... Kat Lee with twin Kit and gran on Jeremy Kyle
Corrie Jimmi's porn pal on Jeremy Kyle - Gran asked: Is Kat forcing twin into prostitution?

video.caption: CORRIE star Jimmi Harkishin's porn star pal once confessed all on telly

article.caption: Porny Dev-il
Looks like a Suni day, Dev
Dev gets battered
Steve's got a birdie on the 15th

articles.articlebody:
CORRIE favourite Jimmi Harkishin's porn star pal Kat Lee appeared in an episode of Jeremy Kyle with her twin sister Kit and their gran, it has emerged.

The sisters' distraught grandmother Pat appeared in a programme with the theme "Is my granddaughter forcing her twin into porn and prostitution?".

The footage, which aired around three years ago, showed Kat, 25, real name Zayna Ellemore, explaining that she has been in multiple X-rated videos with her sibling.

And although she was a willing participant, Kit, real name Noor Ellemore, accused Kat of being the ringleader in their career in blue movies and escorting.

She also said her sister snubbed her away from their workplace.

Talk show ringmaster Jeremy asked three audience members to watch some of their raunchy movies and the ladies told of their disgust after viewing them.

Earlier this week 52-year-old Jimmi  who has played shopkeeper Dev Alahan for 13 years  took Kat along to a showbiz premiere as his date.

The pair attended the first night of musical Chicago at Manchester's Palace Theatre with other TV celebs.

Later the pair were spotted heading to Kat's city centre flat and Jimmi didn't leave until well after midnight.

Yesterday all Kat would say was: "I was at the show with him but I don't want to talk about it."
articles.teaser: HARKISHIN'S porn star pal appeared on Jeremy Kyle with twin sister Kit and their gran
articles.headline: Corrie Jimmi's porn star pal on Jeremy Kyle with twin sister and their gran
articles.subdeck: Porn problem ... Kat Lee with twin Kit and gran on Jeremy Kyle

article.caption: Amanda Holden to host Jesus Christ Superstar
Remake of Morph
Kym Marsh shows off her Tanner

articles.articlebody:
CHEEKY Celia Sawyer has revealed the secret behind becoming an antiques show guru  ASK.

The straight-talking blonde saw a Channel 4 advert asking viewers to send in snaps of their vintage treasures that could appear on Four Rooms.

But instead of putting forward an intriguing object, the feisty interior designer advertised herself as curious collectable  by emailing her own pic to producers.

Celia  who admits she would use her feminine charms to clinch a deal  revealed: "I sent a picture of myself and wrote underneath how about me as a dealer? I did it off the cuff and never expected a reply."

The glam 45-year-old blonde  who appears alongside Andrew Lamberty, Jeff Salmon and Gordon Watson on the show, which sees contestants try to flog their valuables to four competing dealers  told how her favourite items in the second series include Muhammad Ali's boxing gloves.

Astonishingly Hitler's toilet seat, a Victorian sex aid and the Duchess of Cambridge's car also feature on the show.

And other artefacts include a portion of Queen Elizabeth and Prince Philip's wedding cake, Richard Burton's fur coat, the chair on which JK Rowling wrote Harry Potter and artwork by Marlon Brando.

Four Rooms is on tonight at 8pm.
articles.teaser: NEW Four Rooms girl reveals how she bagged job, and intriguing objects on latest series including a Victorian sex toy and Hitler's toilet
articles.headline: Celia: I Sawyer an opportunity and took it

image.caption: Hero ... Captain Rupert Bowers was killed in Afghanistan yesterday

articles.articlebody:
A SOLDIER killed by a blast in Afghanistan was named today as Captain Rupert Bowers.

The 24-year-old, from the 2nd Battalion, The Mercian Regiment (Worcesters and Foresters), was on patrol with Afghan security forces when he was caught by an explosion from an IED yesterday.

The soldier, from Wolverhampton and attached to 2nd Battalion The Rifles, was operating as an adviser to the Afghan National Army in the Mirmandab region of Nahr-e Saraj, Helmand.

He leaves behind wife Victoria and newborn son Hugo.

The MoD said Captain Bowers was commanding a small team responsible for the training of Afghan National Army troops based in Forward Operating Base Ouellette.

He was leading a patrol to clear a position from the threat of insurgents when he was killed.

After studying at the Royal Military Academy Sandhurst, he was commissioned into the 1st Battalion, The Worcestershire and Sherwood Foresters Regiment in April 2007.

After successfully passing the Platoon Commanders' Battle Course in Brecon he joined his regiment in Afghanistan in 2007 where his actions during a complex insurgent ambush resulted in him being mentioned in dispatches.

He later became a Machine Gun Specialist.

His death brings the number of UK military deaths in Afghanistan since 2001 to 405.

It comes after six soldiers died earlier this month when their Warrior armoured vehicle was caught by an explosion. It marked the biggest single loss of British life in Afghanistan since a Nimrod crash in 2006 killed 14.
articles.teaser: CAPTAIN Rupert Bowers was caught in an explosion while on patrol in Helmand
articles.headline: Soldier killed in blast named
articles.subdeck: Hero ... Captain Rupert Bowers was killed in Afghanistan yesterday

image.caption: Loaded ... guy poses with cash on bed

articles.articlebody:
A SUSPECTED gangster poses in a living room beside a giant pile of cash  in this snap sweeping the web.

The pic is part of series of photos that were apparently posted online after they were discovered on a lost mobile phone.

Other images uploaded under the title "Pics from a Chinese gangers phone" (sic) show the tattooed man posing with sports cars including a top of the range Porsche.

Another appears to show a man being tortured in the street with pliers being used to chop off his fingers, before he's forced to sit in a degrading pose with a shoe on his head and a plastic bottle in his mouth.

While the suspected henchman also shows his tender side  as he's snapped with a designer Chow Chow puppy.

The images have been viewed almost 5million times since being posted online two days ago.

One blogger said: "Reddit found an album of pictures ripped off a lost cell phone, normally nothing special, you're just hoping to find some sext's and amateur porn.

"Except this time there's no porn, but a bunch of pictures of what looks to be a Chinese gangster."
articles.teaser: THUG poses with piles of cash and cars in mobile phone photos sweeping internet
articles.headline: 'Gangster's snaps leaked on web'
articles.subdeck: Loaded ... guy poses with cash on bed

image.caption: Record warmth ... March 22 temperature record beaten

articles.articlebody:
SUMMER burst into life today as Brits sunned themselves on the hottest March 22 EVER.

The UK will be hotter than the Sahara tomorrow after the mercury reached 20.1C at Otterbourne, Hants, today just beating a record that stood since 1918.

Beaches were getting ready for a weekend invasion of sun-seekers as dry south-easterly winds from the continent are expected to propel the hot spell on.

Forecasters have predicted temperatures of up to 21C in the South tomorrow with highs of around 20C until at least Monday.

Netweather forecaster Paul Michaelwhite said: "Is it really March? 21C is possible on Friday and that's very impressive considering average March highs are just 9C."

It's only expected to reach 20C tomorrow in the Sahara town of Laghouat in Algeria. Today's record beat the 20C recorded in Lincoln during the First World War.

Sunday could be another record breaker  the hottest March 25 saw 21.7C in 1953. March's warmest ever temperature was 25.6C at Mepal, Cambs, on March 29, 1968.

Met Office forecaster Sarah Holland said: "There will be really nice, warm temperatures and fairly unbroken sunshine in many places through the weekend.

"Friday could see 21C in the Thames corridor area, with Saturday and Sunday much the same, more likely nudging 20C than 21C, and the same again on Monday. "Temperatures are well above average for the time of year and, after misty starts, there will be warm spells with the best sunshine in the east and a little more cloud in the east.

"The warm weather is being caused by mild south-easterly winds and the sun bringing the warm temperatures."
articles.teaser: PARTS of Britain bask in temps of 20.1C making it hottest March 22 ever recorded
articles.headline: UK temperature record broken - and it's good news for the weekend
articles.subdeck: Record warmth ... March 22 temperature record beaten

image.caption: Lying Lo ... Lindsay's twin-up

articles.articlebody:
HOW about this for a springs/summer collection  celebrities dressed like mattresses.

Stars are often accused of heading out looking like they just got out of bed.

But a Facebook photo craze has enthusiasts trying to twin up stars' outfits with the pattern on a dumped mattress.

Dozens of comedy pairings have so far appeared on the social networking site.

Stars including Lindsay Lohan, Diane Kruger and Miley Cyrus are among those who feature.

Let's hope the unflattering comparison does not give them sleepless nights...
articles.teaser: STARS pictured alonside mattresses they look like in latest picture viral joke
articles.headline: I'm a Celeb-bed-y
articles.subdeck: Lying Lo ... Lindsay's twin-up

image.caption: Bloodied ... scene of dog attack

articles.articlebody:
A DEVIL dog went berserk mauling five cops - leaving four of them seriously injured - during a raid today.

The vicious "pit bull-type" mutt attacked the officers as they tried to arrest a suspect - and had to be shot FOUR times.

Scotland Yard said it was killed after a firearms unit was called to the scene following the attack near Stratford, east London.

Four of the constables were in a serious but stable condition. Several officers suffered bites to their legs and arms.

The remaining PC suffered minor injuries but there were large blood stains on the road and pavement.

A force statement said: "Police attended an address in Albert Square to execute an arrest warrant at approximately 9am.

"While officers from Newham attempted to arrest a male suspect, they were attacked by a pitbull-type dog.

"A dog unit was called to the scene and CO19 Specialist Firearms Command also attended. The dog was contained and subsequently shot dead."

Pools of blood were visible near the entrance to the property in Albert Square in east London.

The most seriously hurt officer could be facing skin grafts to repair wounds to his arms and legs.

Officers confirmed the swoop was part of Operation Big Wing, a major Scotland Yard purge on offences ranging from robbery and burglary to domestic violence.

The man, who is thought to own the dog, was arrested for grievous bodily harm and kidnapping, a spokeswoman said.

Dog bite incidents in the UK have risen 79% in London and 43% nationally in recent years, according to figures obtained by the Kennel Club.
articles.teaser: OFFICERS all went to hospital after dog attacked during morning raid
articles.headline: Five cops mauled by devil dog
articles.subdeck: Bloodied ... scene of dog attack

image.caption: Gunned down ... James Cooper, 25, and James Kouzaris, 24

articles.articlebody:
TWO Brit holidaymakers shot dead after drunkenly wandering into a rough Florida neighbourhood were found with no shirts on and their trousers round their thighs, a court heard today.

Jurors were told James Kouzaris, 24, and James Cooper, 25, were gunned down when they told a 17-year-old would-be robber they had no money.

The men were on holiday with Mr Cooper's family and had been out drinking after a meal in central Sarasota.

But somehow they ended up in the rundown Newtown area where Shawn Tyson is said to have callously executed them down.

He is charged with two counts of first-degree murder and, if found guilty, faces life in jail without the possibility of parole.

Prosecutor Ed Brodsky said: "The evidence will conclusively demonstrate to you that this man right here is responsible for the deaths of James Cooper and James Kouzaris.

"You will find that this case is about two different sets of boys, men, who seized opportunities."

The murder weapon has never been found. But the prosecution claims witnesses have linked bullet casings matching those that killed the men to Tyson and says he was often seen carrying a gun matching the one that is believed to have been used.

Defence lawyers say there is nothing to link the teenager directly and several witnesses have changed their evidence because of deals offered by the prosecution.

Mr Kouzaris and Mr Cooper left a nightclub called the Gator Club at around 2am on April 16 last year.

Residents in Newtown heard shot around 2.56am and when emergency services arrived the men were found on either side of the road.

Mr Brodsky said: "In a grassy patch they would find James Cooper, shirtless, clutching his shirt in his hand, his blue jeans that he was wearing would be found pulled down about mid-thigh level.

"Police would also find that James Cooper still had his wallet in his possession, he still had his money in his possession, he still had his cellphone and his camera in his possession.

"Directly across the street from James Cooper the police would find the body of James Kouzaris, and James Kouzaris would be found with his pants pulled down to the thigh level.

"He would also be shirtless and police and fire would find his shirt tucked into the back of his pants.

"But as they found James Cooper, they would find James Kouzaris had his wallet and he had his money still in his possession."

Mr Cooper was shot four times. Three bullets went straight through his body.

The fatal shot went into his chest, perforated his left lung and ended up in his heart.

Mr Kouzaris was shot twice in the back, and was killed by a bullet which perforated his spleen, diaphragm, left lung and his heart.

The court heard the bullets were from a 0.22 calibre weapon.

The trial continues.
articles.teaser: 'TEEN gunman shot Brits dead on holiday when they said they had no money'
articles.headline: Slaughtered Brits found half dressed
articles.subdeck: Gunned down ... James Cooper, 25, and James Kouzaris, 24

image.caption: Break ... hurt Jamie Thomas

articles.articlebody:
ENGLAND ace Wayne Rooney broke a nine-year-old football fan's wrist - after he fluffed a SHOT at a Premier League match.

Manchester United fan Jamie Thomas was cheering on his idols when the £250,000-a-week star miskicked the ball sending it careering into the crowd.

The accident happened during the warm-up session before the English champions' match against Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sunday.

Unknown to Rooney, his mis-hit shot flew straight at Jamie who was sitting in the front row of the Jack Harris Stand at Molineux with dad Andy, 31.

Jamie ducked and put his arms up to protect his face but the ball smashed into him.

The lad managed to watch the first half of the match which saw United beat Wolves 5-0 but was taken into the first aid tent after his arm "ballooned" at half time.

Medics were so worried they sent Jamie, from Wem, Shrops, to hospital where he had a plaster cast put on his injured wrist.

Dad-of-three Andy, who works at a slaughter house, said: "It was his first Man Utd game and we were in the Wolves end because somebody got us tickets.

"We were sat on the first row right at the front. We were with my nephew, Jamie's uncle, his sister and her brother.

"The players were warming up and Rooney and Hernandez were taking a few shots.

"Rooney missed one and it was coming straight towards Jamie so he put out his hands to stop it hitting him and it broke his wrist.

"He did well to put his arms up because it would have taken his head off otherwise - it was a hell of a shot.

"At first we thought it was just bruising but Jamie wasn't enjoying the game and it ballooned in size so we went to first aid at half time. We ended up missing most of the second half.

"The medical staff wanted us to go to Wolverhampton hospital but we were catching the train so we went to Shrewsbury instead. They said it was a clean break and he has to go back in a couple of weeks."

Ace Roo had no idea he had broken the lad's arm - but promised to send him a signed shirt last night to say sorry.

A spokeswoman for the Man U said: "Wayne did not have any idea this had happened. He has now signed a shirt for Jamie and will be writing to him to apologise."

And the youngster has also been promised a special day out at Molineux.
articles.teaser: MAN United ace accidentally broke boy's wrist in missed shot during warm-up
articles.headline: Rooney mis-hit breaks lad's wrist
articles.subdeck: Break ... hurt Jamie Thomas

image.caption: Axe ... Michael Shephard was fired for eating grape

articles.articlebody:
A BUS driver has been sacked for eating a GRAPE while sitting on a stationary bus with no passengers on board.

Grandad Michael Shepherd claims he ate the piece of fruit as he was sitting alone on the bus at the terminus before his shift.

And he says he was only munching on the grape to quench his thirst  because the medication he takes after having a heart-by-pass last year gives him a dry mouth.

But despite his protests the 66-year-old has been axed by bosses National Express on health and safety grounds.

Mr Shephard said: "I don't eat or drink while I am driving but I was just sat stationary at the bus terminus for a few minutes and took a grape to wet my mouth a bit.

"I had a heart by-pass 12 months ago and the medication dries your mouth so I just take a sip of water or a grape sometimes when I'm sat at the station or the terminus.

"I explained why I needed to have a sip of water or a grape every hour or so but they said it was still against health and safety rules.

"I think it is ridiculous they are following the rules without stopping to consider whether the punishment fits the crime."

Mr Shephard's actions were caught on CCTV which was used as grounds for his dismissal on February 29.

He claims he was still eating the grape as he drove off from the terminus, and may then have scratched his nose or touched his face.

But he says the action led bosses to accuse him of continuing to eat while he was at the wheel.

Mr Shephard, who lives in Coventry with his wife Shelia, 62, is concerned that he will not find work again because he is past retirement age.

He said: "We haven't paid off our mortgage yet and we might lose the house. I'm very worried. Who is going to employ an old man like me now?"

After five years of loyal service Mr Shephard will appeal National Express' decision to dismiss him.

A spokesman for National Express said: "The driver in question hasn't exhausted the disciplinary process that we have as a company and as a result we cannot make any public comment.

"However we do hold ourselves to high levels of safety and customer care standards."
articles.teaser: A THIRSTY bus driver has been sacked for eating a GRAPE while he was parked with no passengers on board
articles.headline: Bus driver axed for eating GRAPE
articles.subdeck: Axe ... Michael Shephard was fired for eating grape

image.caption: Belle not at the ball ... Megan Piper agreed to go to prom but officials barred her

articles.articlebody:
A HIGH school student's plans to take a porn star to his prom are in tatters after school bosses banned her.

Mike Stone, 18, had sent hundreds of tweets to blue movie actresses, asking them to accompany him to the leavers' ball.

His plea came after he struggled to find a date for the do.

Megan Piper was one of the two women who replied and agreed to join him at the dance in Oakdale, Minnesota, if he paid for her travel from LA, California.

Piper said she had been excited about going because she had not made it to her own prom.

And she said: "I thought it was really cute, and I thought it would make his night by saying 'yes'."

But Mike's dream is over after the authorities blocked the move. Local school district superintendent Patty Phillips said Piper, 19, would be banned because her appearance would be "inconsistent" with what was expected of visitors to the school.

Mike's bid echoes that of Sergeant Scott Moore, who asked actress Mila Kunis to be his date for the Marine Corps Ball via a YouTube video.

Mila agreed and accompanied the soldier to the bash last November.

Acting colleague Justin Timberlake attended the Basic School Instructor Battalion 236th Marine Corps Birthday Ball in Richmond, Virginia, with Corporal Kelsey De Santis.

Singer Taylor Swift was asked via Facebook to be the prom date of a New Jersey high school student.

She could not go in the end but invited him to the Academy of Country Music Awards in Las Vegas on April instead.
articles.teaser: TEENAGE student has dream date scuppered as school bans porn star from dance
articles.headline: Teen's porn star date is banned from prom
articles.subdeck: Belle not at the ball ... Megan Piper agreed to go to prom but officials barred her

image.caption: Jailed ... former soap star Brian Regan

articles.articlebody:
A FORMER Brookside star has been jailed for perverting the course of justice  but cleared of murder.

Brian Regan, 52, who played Terry Sullivan in the now defunct Channel Four soap, is today serving a four years and ten months term after being convicted in January.

The sentence can only be reported today after Mrs Justice Nicola Davies lifted reporting restrictions.

She had put the order on Regan's case to avoid prejudicing the trial of Jason Gabbana, 29, who has now been convicted of ordering the murder of doorman Bahman Faraji, 44.

Ex-actor Regan admitted driving gunman Edward Heffey to and from the scene.

But he said he did not know his passenger was carrying a sawn-off shotgun and planning to kill Mr Faraji.

He went on to lie to police and disposed of gloves he wore on the night.

Regan, of St Mary's Road, Liverpool, had denied murder along with Heffey, 40, Lee Dodson, 42, and Simon Smart, 32.

After a three-month trial, verdicts were returned on January 24.

Smart, of Kylemore Way, Liverpool, who lured Mr Faraji to the pub, and gunman Heffey, of Beloe Street, both Liverpool, were convicted of murder.

Dodson, of Logfield Drive, Liverpool, who was Regan's best friend and cocaine supplier, was found not guilty of arranging for Regan to drive the getaway car.

Regan was also sentenced for two counts of supplying Class A drugs and two counts of possession of Class A drugs with intent to supply.

Gabbana, 29, of Childwall, Liverpool, was convicted of ordering the gangland murder and is facing a life sentence.
articles.teaser: FORMER soap star Brian Regan was convicted of two counts of perverting justice
articles.headline: Former Brookside star jailed for 4yrs
articles.subdeck: Jailed ... former soap star Brian Regan

image.caption: Elderly lose ... according to Treasury

article.caption: Gran Theft Osbo
He's taking us for fuels
Budget 2012 offers crumb of comfort for workers
TANKS A LOT, GEORGE

articles.articlebody:
THE Budget was as clear as mud today as George Osborne went head-to-head with his own Treasury officials over whether OAPs will lose out.

As the Chancellor leapt to the defence of his controversial changes to Britain's tax system amid a growing backlash there was confusion over declarations from the heart of Government.

Mr Osborne told MPs yesterday that he was scrapping age-related allowances introduced by Winston Churchill in 1925  leading to accusations he was bringing in a £1billion "granny tax".

The move has been condemned as "outrageous" by campaign groups.

But Mr Osborne told ITV's Daybreak: "No pensioner loses cash.

"No one watching this programme is a pensioner who is going to lose any cash as a result.

"They're not going to lose cash, we're going to increase the benefit. At the same time they'll be better off because the basic state pension is going up in a couple of weeks time by over £5 a week.

"No one loses any cash from this Budget."

But the Treasury then admitted 4.5million pensioners WOULD lose out and Treasury sources confirmed existing pensioners would be, on average, £63 a year worse off while new pensioners would lose out to the tune of £197 a year.

Under the Chancellor's plans, the allowances  the point at which earnings start to attract income tax - will be withdrawn for new pensioners from April next year.

Existing pensioners will have their allowances frozen at £10,500 for the over-65s and £10,660 for the over-75s. They won't change until everyone else's tax thresholds catch up over the coming years.

Mr Osborne also cut the 50p top rate for Britain's wealthiest earners and lifted thousands of low-paid workers out of taxation altogether.
articles.teaser: CHANCELLOR insists OAPs will have just as much cash - Treasury says otherwise
articles.headline: Osborne: Elderly will not lose out
articles.subdeck: Elderly lose ... according to Treasury

image.caption: Recovered ... 17 'lost' drawings by tragic explorer Dr Edward Wilson to be printed in their entirety

articles.articlebody:
THE "lost" drawings of an explorer who died on Captain Scott's North Pole exhibition have been seen together for the first time in nearly 100 years.

Tragic Dr Edward Wilson sketched 17 snowy landscapes of Antarctica during the voyage with Captain Scott's team that would eventually kill him.

Because he could not use his watercolours outside in -56C (-70F), Dr Wilson made notes what shades to use and finished the works at their base hut at Cape Evans.

The paintings, made between April and June 1911, depict a snow-covered wilderness shrouded in darkness.

One, painted from a hill-top, shows a desolate snowy scene with two tiny figures from the expedition team walking along the sea ice.

Others show two birds flying near an icy cave and skis stuck in the snow.

Further creations are of two explorers exercising donkeys they took with them and a handful of men heaving sledges across the ice.

Dr Wilson died in a tent with Captain Scott and fellow explorer Lieutenant Henry Robertson Bowers in March 1912.

But his works were recovered from the base and first published in Scott's Last Expedition Diaries in 1913  the last time they were assembled together.

Nine of the originals were donated by Dr Wilson's family to a museum but have only gone on display recently.

Now they have been re-printed in a new edition of Scott's diaries  99 years after their first publication.

Dr Peter Lloyd Jones, chairman of the Captain Scott Society, said: "Wilson was a tremendous graphic artist and was considered to be the perfect person to send on the mission.

"He produced some very evocative images under very difficult circumstances.

"They are pensive and thoughtful images, not incredibly exciting but very reflective.

"There was a photographer on the expedition and the photos have been increasingly accessible over the years.

"But Wilson's pictures have not. In some respects they are lost work."
articles.teaser: STUNNING scenes sketched by polar explorer before he perished are uncovered
articles.headline: Tragic polar explorer's paintings 'back together' 100 years on
articles.subdeck: Recovered ... 17 'lost' drawings by tragic explorer Dr Edward Wilson to be printed in their entirety

image.caption: On target ... Wheel Power FC

articles.articlebody:
THIS Sunday football team have bagged a new record after hammering their local rivals 58-0  the biggest ever defeat inflicted on a side in British history.

Wheel Power FC smashed Nova 2010 FC in the Torbay Sunday League clash in Torquay, Devon.

It was 5-0 after five minutes and 20-0 by half time before the league leaders netted a further 38 strikes.

On form brothers Robbie and Stuart Bowker scored 28 times between them, with Robbie bagging 18 of those.

The scoreline beats the previous record  Cornish side Illogan's 55-0 thrashing of Madron FC in November 2010.

Nova arrived for the match last Sunday at Wheel Power's ground with just five players but managed to get a team of nine together to face their ten-man opponents.

Wheel Power's Stuart, 21, said: "At 50-0 they'd had enough but the referee told them they must carry on playing or they would risk being fined.

"After the final whistle a couple of their players shook hands but the rest just got into their cars and drove off, but you can't really blame them for that.

"They weren't even bottom of the league."

The winning side's player/manager Andy Woodward, who scored just once, added: "The referee's biro went blunt after a while.

"It was a bit embarrassing but fair play to the other team for carrying on - they were really sporting.

"The result will certainly help at the end of the season if it goes down to goal difference."

Nova's Lewis Parker, 60, said: "A lot of the players didn't turn up so we expected to lose but not by that much."
articles.teaser: SUNDAY football team beat previous record for biggest defeat 55-0 during match in Devon amateur league
articles.headline: 58-0 win is new footie record
articles.subdeck: On target ... Wheel Power FC

image.caption: Camera-flaged ... Craig wears combat gear to take pics

articles.articlebody:
HOT shot Craig Jones quit his job as an army sniper to become a wildlife photographer  and says his military training helps him take stunning pictures without animals noticing he is there.

He has just spent FOUR MONTHS in full combat camouflage hiding out to capture these incredible owl snaps.

Eagle-eyed Craig, from Stoke-on-Trent, Staffs, said: "As a sniper our motto was 'to see without being seen'. I just employ that but in the wild.

"I integrate myself into the foliage of the marshes so that the owls barely notice I'm there.

"I use the terrain and its features to mask my ground movement and break up my outline and blend in.

"Reading the signals around you that nature will show you, watching for changes in wind direction can be the difference of seeing the subject and not.

"So everything has to be planned down to the very last detail. The deodorant you wear, the toothpaste you use, the smell of your clothes believe it or not it all matters."

In one spectacular shot, Craig captures an owl seemingly heading straight down the barrel of his lens.

While another shows a barn owl seconds after it swoops in on its prey  a dormouse  and carries it off to feast on.

Craig, who left the army to become a full-time wildlife photographer, added: "I've always had an affinity with owls. Ever since I was a lad growing up on a council estate I'd go to this little area that had been left by the council to just overgrow.

"I love all wildlife now, but owls were the creatures that got me interested in the world outside my urban council estate."
articles.teaser: HOT shot quit services and says his training helps him take pics without wildlife noticing
articles.headline: From army sniper to animal snapper
articles.subdeck: Camera-flaged ... Craig wears combat gear to take pics

image.caption: Big baby ... Stanley Thornton enjoys spending his day dressed and acting like a toddler

video.caption: GROWN man wears nappies, sleeps in cot...and is looking for a new mum

articles.articlebody:
A MAN of 31 spends his days pretending to be a two-year-old  complete with wearing nappies and a dummy.

Stanley Thornton has spent the last 18 years as an adult baby, wearing a romper suit and sleeping in a super-sized cot.

Stanley, who revealed his favourite age is two, said: "I feel like when I'm wearing a diaper, it's like a constant hug from mommy.

"I think about acting like a baby every day.

"For me it's a big part of my life  it's something you can go to bed doing."

He added: "I feel having a crib is the most important thing.

"The bars, they signify safety and it's something babies have when they are growing up."

American Stanley has also kitted out his home with a playpen, crayons and a giant high chair where he eats his meals.

The 5ft 6in man gets his baby clothes tailor-made, including pyjamas and a special blue romper suit.

Stanley  who weighs in at 21st and is on benefits  claims his desire to dress up and play baby stems from his childhood.

He said: "It's not sexual at all. It's a feeling of being safe.

"It's a feeling I didn't have while growing up  and being an adult baby became my way of coping with the world and my own problems."

American Stanley  who was featured on TLC's My Crazy Obsession  is currently searching for a full-time mum.

Any takers?
articles.teaser: FULLY-GROWN man lives life as an adult baby
articles.headline: What a dummy
articles.subdeck: Big baby ... Stanley Thornton enjoys spending his day dressed and acting like a toddler

image.caption: M25 rapist ... Antoni Imiela

article.caption: Monster rape quiz 23yrs on
Rape nut turns Buddhist

articles.articlebody:
COPS appealed for more victims of "the M25 Rapist" to come forward today as he was sentenced over an eighth terrifying sex attack.

Violent Antoni Imiela - who preyed on victims as young as 10 - was found guilty of raping a complete stranger and caged for 12 years at the Old Bailey.

The 1987 attack came more than a decade before he committed a series of stranger rapes around the Home Counties.

Speaking outside court, Detective Inspector John Foulkes said: "It's likely that the police are unaware of all his offending.

"I appeal to the public, and in particular anyone who is a potential victim of his in the late 1980s or between 1996 and 2002, to come forward."

The brute had claimed the late Sheila Jankowitz was a willing participant in the Christmas Day assault.

But an Old Bailey jury refused to believe him after hearing her evidence from beyond the grave - she was murdered in an unrelated incident in 2006.

Mrs Jankowitz  who died in South Africa - had rowed with her husband Erwin and was returning home to look for him when Imiela grabbed her off the street in Forest Hill, south-east London, and threatened to murder her.

Dragged

The mum-of-two was dragged behind a shed and assaulted. At one point her husband walked by oblivious to what was happening.

Then 31, she was punched repeatedly in the face as she tried to resist and was told if she looked at his face she would be killed.

Chillingly, she had heard her husband walk past during the assault close to their flat which left her with mental health problems until her death.

Erwin said in evidence: "That really upset me because the shed was so close - two metres away. I could have stopped it happening but as he had his hand over her mouth restraining it, she couldn't call out."

German-born Imiela, 57, was also found guilty of indecent assault and buggery over the attack which he committed knowing he faced jail over a string of armed robberies carried out after he lost his job as a plasterer.

He was sentenced shortly afterwards to 14 years in prison and released in 1996 when he found work on the railways.

But by 2004 he was back behind bars after raping seven women and children in a "savage and perverted campaign against total strangers" in 2001 and 2002.

Prostitutes

Colleagues later recalled how he bragged about using prostitutes and boasted over a fling with a girl he said looked only 12.

Days earlier he had driven to Birmingham and kidnapped a 10-year-old girl at knifepoint before putting her through a five-hour sex ordeal in his car. Suspicions grew his stories were really tales of his sex attacks. He also suggested the little girl might have "deserved it".

He got seven life sentences for attacking children as young as 10, 13 and 14 and women as old as 52. He often chose to attack near the M25 motorway which led to him being dubbed "the M25 rapist".

After that trial he wrote to his son, confessing: "I cannot control my sexual urges. I'm a man, you must understand that sometimes you have no control over your impulses."

When Mrs Jankowitz was assaulted, DNA matching was in its infancy and it wasn't until a cold case review was carried out in 2009 that a match was found.

Bloodied

Her mother-in-law also gave evidence, as did her daughter Charlene who was meant to have been in bed but recalled, aged 10, seeing her mum through the banisters with bloodied clothes saying she had been raped.

In evidence sicko Imiela told the jury he had "made love" to her and at one point lost his temper with the prosecutor, calling him a "jumped up little ****".

His later attacks all echoed the first.

He would grab his victim where they walked before dragging them to a secluded spot where he assaulted them.

Imiela was given a minimum term of eight years for his later attacks and became eligible for parole this month  but Judge John Bevan QC said he is as dangerous now as he was when he was sentenced.

Jailing Imiela for 12 years, he told him: "I find this case saddening, not only because Sheila Jankowitz's life was blighted from at least 1990 onwards by mental illness until her murder in 2006 but I also find your approach saddening, surprising as it may seem.

"You are wholly unrepentant about your life of guns, rape and general violence and, despite having served eight years of your life sentence, you have not expressed one jot of remorse."

"You remained silent until you knew she was dead and then you tried to use that to your advantage."
articles.teaser: SICK Antoni Imiela sentenced to 12 years over horror 1987 stranger rape
articles.headline: M25 Rapist guilty of eighth ordeal
articles.subdeck: M25 rapist ... Antoni Imiela

image.caption: Jump ... Christine goes off bridge with bungee rope

video.caption: PARALYSED thrillseeker Christine Rougoor does sport in wheelchair

articles.articlebody:
A DAREDEVIL paralysed woman has taken part in a 150ft bungee jump sat in her WHEELCHAIR.

Paraplegic thrill-seeker Christine Rougoor, 24, fulfilled a lifelong dream by taking part in the challenge.

The incredible feat was captured on camera and show Miss Rougoor yelling with joy during the jump.

She said: "It gave me a couple of seconds of freedom from any worries and thoughts.

"I would do it again in a heartbeat.

"The minute I got back, I begged them to push me back over."

The one-minute film shows Miss Rougoor, who is paralysed from the waist down, on a bridge in British Columbia, Canada.

Helpers then hoist her onto the rails before chucking her wheels-first over the edge.

She lost the use of her legs back in 2008 when she was involved in a biking accident in Florida.

Christine was in a coma for three weeks after the crash before waking up on Christmas Day.

Since then she has trained as an art and French teacher and raised money for good causes, including Wheels in Motion.

The amazing jump was made possible by 9Lives Adventures, who do extreme sports for disabled people.

Founder Karim Ladki said: "I normally tell the first-time jumpers to stay in the chair as it provides a good back support and keeps you upright.

"This also prevents any blood from moving around the body too much, furthermore preventing any light-headedness or black-outs."
articles.teaser: WHEELCHAIR bound daredevil Christine Rougoor does stunning 150ft jump
articles.headline: Paralysed girl in bungee jump
articles.subdeck: Jump ... Christine goes off bridge with bungee rope

image.caption: Caught ... Australia's most wanted Malcolm Naden

articles.articlebody:
COPS have captured Australia's most wanted man after he used Ray Mears-style skills to hide in forests for SEVEN YEARS.

Malcolm Naden, 38, was finally tracked down today at a small house, north of Sydney by New South Wales police.

He was bearded, barefoot and covered with mud when he was apprehended.

A police dog Chuck was credited with helping to keep him at bay as cops made their arrest.

Naden was charged with the murder of his cousin Kristy Scholes and other violent crimes.

New South Wales Police Commissioner Andrew Scipione said: "Australia's most wanted man is behind bars.

"He is a master bushman. He has been in this area for a number of years.

"He knows it better than the back of his hand."

Naden had been on the run since 2005 after Kirsty, 24, was found dead in a bedroom of the house he shared with his grandparents in Dubbo.

Naden quickly became a suspect in the killing and officials admitted they thought he could be hiding out in the wilderness.

Since September 50 cops have been working around the clock to find him after he shot an officer during a campsite raid.

He managed to avoid capture by adopting the sort of survival skills used by Ray Mears who has become a world authority on bushcraft and has made a string of documentaries on the subject.

Naden has also been charged with two counts of aggravated indecent assault and one of shooting with intent to murder.

He has also been named as a suspect in the disappearance of his cousin Lateesha Nolan.

Her dad Mick Peet said a detective called him at around 2am and to reveal "We've got him".

Mick said: "It made me go all weak in the knees.

"I just thought, 'I hope he's alive, first up, because I need him alive to answer questions.

"You can always imagine what might have happened to her, but you'd never know until you get the answers."

Naden was refused bail and has had his case adjourned until April 24.
articles.teaser: BUSHMAN Malcolm Naden used Ray Mears-style skills to evade capture
articles.headline: Most wanted man hid in wild for seven years
articles.subdeck: Caught ... Australia's most wanted Malcolm Naden

image.caption: Emily Horne ... 'settling down' with hubby No7

articles.articlebody:
BRITAIN'S most notorious bigamist dodged jail yesterday  because she's finally settling down with her SEVENTH hubby.

Emily Horne, 33, once caged for a string of marriage frauds, was on trial for conning pills out of the NHS  by posing as husband Craig Hadwin.

She cut her hair and wore baggy clothes to fool a GP into giving her a prescription. She also gave an NHS phoneline a false name and address.

The ex-porn star admitted committing fraud while under a suspended jail sentence for bigamy.

But Recorder Jonathan Barnes gave her a "last chance" after hearing she was still with Craig  even though he'd been a victim of one of her sham weddings.

Horne, of Wells, Somerset, has changed her name to Max Accastes Quiberon. She got a 12-month supervision order and a one-month curfew.
articles.teaser: BRITAIN'S most notorious bigamist dodges jail  as she's settling down 7th hubby
articles.headline: Bigamist goes free thanks to fella No7
articles.subdeck: Emily Horne ... 'settling down' with hubby No7

image.caption: Shame ... police raided 14 premises in Oxford in sex abuse probe

articles.articlebody:
COPS have arrested 12 men in a child sex ring investigation.

They swooped on 14 addresses in Oxford as part of an operation targeting child exploitation. They believe the victims were 24 girls aged 11 to 16.

Operation Bullfinch was a joint probe by Thames Valley Police and Oxfordshire County Council's Children, Education and Families Department.

The 12 men, aged 21 to 37, were held on suspicion of offences including the prostitution of females under the age of 18, administrating drugs for the purpose of rape, trafficking, grooming and rape.

Det Supt Rob Mason said: "We believe we have uncovered an organised crime group who have been running a business of selling young girls for sex.

"We have also identified a number of customers who we have reason to believe have used this service.

"We believe the offending spans a six-year period. The warrants executed today are the second phase of this investigation and the arrests have been made to protect the girls from further harm.

"Our number one priority is to protect the victims, both their identities and wellbeing."

The suspects are in custody at police stations waiting to be quizzed by cops.

Oxford Commander, Supt Chris Sharp, said: "I understand today's events will have an impact on residents.

"There are individuals and groups who may seek to take advantage of the young and vulnerable.

"It is our job, working with our partners to prevent whatever form of abuse takes place and bring those responsible to justice."
articles.teaser: POLICE in Oxford raid 14 addresses after probing claims 24 girls were abused
articles.headline: Cops nab 12 over 'child sex ring'
articles.subdeck: Shame ... police raided 14 premises in Oxford in sex abuse probe
